meanings.definition: A short, high-pitched sound or series of sounds.
meanings.sent1: The beeping of the alarm clock woke me up.
meanings.sent2: I heard the beeping of the microwave when my food was ready.
meanings.sent3: The beeping of the smoke detector made the cat jump in surprise.
meanings.sent4: The beeping of the heart monitor was a constant reminder of the patient's condition.
meanings.sent5: The beeping of the car horn echoed through the quiet street.

meanings.definition: The act of emitting a beeping sound.
meanings.sent1: The constant beeping of the machine was annoying.
meanings.sent2: I couldn't concentrate with the beeping coming from the computer.
meanings.sent3: The beeping of the toy robot entertained the children for hours.
meanings.sent4: The beeping of the truck backing up filled the air with caution.
meanings.sent5: The beeping of the phone signaled an incoming call.
